faqs.question: What is the capital appreciation history of commercial property here

faqs.question: Do I need to pay Goods and Services Tax on the purchase of a ready shop
faqs.answer: Generally GST is not applicable on the purchase of a completed ready-to-move-in commercial property where the Completion Certificate has been received. However if the shop is under construction or if you are purchasing a fresh allotment from a developer before the CC is issued GST will be applicable. We recommend consulting a legal expert to confirm the current tax implications based on the specific property status.

faqs.question: What legal due diligence is required before investing in commercial property
faqs.answer: Comprehensive legal due diligence is essential. This includes verifying the developer's title to the land checking for clear encumbrances ensuring all statutory approvals like fire NOC and structural stability certificates are in place and reviewing the terms of the builder-buyer agreement or sale deed. We connect our clients with seasoned real estate lawyers specializing in commercial transactions in Gurugram.

faqs.question: What is the typical lock-in period and lease duration for commercial tenants
faqs.answer: In Sector 41 the standard lease term for commercial shops is typically 9 years often structured as 3+3+3 years with rent escalations built into each block. The standard lock-in period during which the tenant cannot terminate the lease is usually 36 months to ensure stability for the investor. These strong lease structures secure consistent income streams for the owner.

faqs.question: Can non-residents invest in a commercial Shop For Sale in Sector 41
faqs.answer: Yes non-resident Indians (NRIs) and Persons of Indian Origin (PIOs) are legally permitted to invest in commercial properties in India including buying a Shop For Sale in Sector 41 Gurugram. The acquisition must comply with the Foreign Exchange Management Act FEMA regulations regarding the repatriation of sale proceeds and rental income. We provide specialized consultation services for our NRI clients to navigate these requirements smoothly.
